QUESTION LABEL WAS NOT DEFINED, PLEASE CONTACT ADMINISTRATOR
What is the purpose of All of Us?

extension.valueString: ¿Cuál es el propósito de All of Us?

option.display: To give medical advice and treatment.

extension.valueString: Ofrecer consejo médico y tratamiento médico.

option.display: To help scientists make discoveries about health.

extension.valueString: Ayudar a los investigadores a hacer descubrimientos en el área de la salud.

question.text: Do I have to take part in All of Us?

extension.valueString: ¿Tengo que participar en All of Us?

option.display: Taking part is voluntary. I get to choose if I want to do it.

extension.valueString: La participación es voluntaria. Puedo decidir si quiero hacerlo.

option.display: Taking part is required. I have to do it.

extension.valueString: La participación es obligatoria. Tengo que hacerlo.

question.text: If I join, can I withdraw (“quit”)?

extension.valueString: Si participo, ¿puedo dejar de participar en All of Us en cualquier momento?

option.display: I can withdraw at any time.

extension.valueString: Puedo dejar de participar en cualquier momento.
No puedo dejar de participar nunca.

question.text: Using smartphones, apps, and sensors are always a potential risk to privacy. Can All of Us research guarantee your privacy?

extension.valueString: El uso de teléfonos celulares inteligentes (smartphones), aplicaciones y sensores siempre constituye un posible riesgo a su privacidad. ¿Puede All of Us garantizar su privacidad?

option.display: Risks to my privacy are minimized, but are not zero.

extension.valueString: Los riesgos a mi privacidad son mínimos, pero posibles.

question.text:
You got 4 of 4 questions correct.
Take the time you need to decide about joining All of Us. We are here to answer any questions you have.

extension.valueString:
Respondió correctamente 4 preguntas de un total de 4. 
Tómese el tiempo necesario para decidir si desea formar parte de All of Us. Estamos aquí para responder cualquier pregunta que tenga.

question.text:
Have you ever received care at a UPMC healthcare provider? 

This may include care in a UPMC hospital, physician practice, urgent care center, or emergency room.

extension.valueString:
¿Alguna vez ha recibido atención con un proveedor de cuidados de salud de UPMC? 

Esto puede incluir atención en un hospital, consultorio de un médico, centro de atención de urgencia o sala de emergencias de UPMC.

question.text: Have you already scheduled an appointment with your local PA Cares for Us team for physical measurements and biosample collection?

extension.valueString: ¿Alguna vez programó una cita con su equipo local de PA Cares for Us para tomarse mediciones físicas o obtener una muestra biológica?

question.text: The All of Us Research Program is enrolling participants at the following healthcare sites. At which location do you wish to schedule your visit?

extension.valueString: El Estudio de Investigación Científica All of Us está inscribiendo participantes en los sigiuentes sitios de atención medica. ¿En cual sitio quiere hacer su cita?

option.display: PHOENIX: Banner University Medical Center – Phoenix (formerly known as Good Samaritan Hospital or Good Sam)

extension.valueString: PHOENIX: Banner University Medical Center – Phoenix (formalmente conocido como Good Samaritan Hospital o Good Sam)

option.display: MESA: Banner Desert Medical Center (formerly known as Desert Samaritan)

extension.valueString: MESA: Banner Desert Medical Center (formalmente conocido como Desert Samaritan)

option.display: TUCSON: University Campus: Banner University Medical Center – Tucson (formerly known as University of Arizona Medical Center or UMC, University Physicians or UPH)

extension.valueString: TUCSON: University Campus: Banner University Medical Center – Tucson (formalmente conocido como University of Arizona Medical Center o UMC, University Physicians o UPH)

option.display: TUCSON: South Campus: Banner University Medical Center – South (formerly known as Kino Hospital)

extension.valueString: TUCSON: South Campus: Banner University Medical Center – South (formalmente conocido como Kino Hospital)

option.display: CASA GRANDE: Banner Casa Grande Medical Center
SUN CITY: Banner Boswell Medical Center

question.text:
You are welcome to enroll in one of the California Precision Medicine Consortium (CAPMC) sites.  

Participants in the CAPMC include those who receive their healthcare from provider organizations in California such as University of California Medical Centers and affiliates, University of Southern California, Cedars-Sinai Medical Center, and other healthcare organizations. Will you enroll through CAPMC?

Are you currently a patient at any of the following Eau Claire clinics or health centers?

Waverly Family Practice
Pelion Family Practice

extension.valueString:
¿Actualmente es paciente de alguna de estas clínicas o centros de salud de Eau Claire?

Waverly Family Practice
Pelion Family Practice

question.text:
Have you ever received care at a Henry Ford Health System facility or are you currently affiliated with the institution? 

This may include receiving care in a HFHS hospital, urgent care, emergency department, outpatient clinic or through HFHS employee health.

extension.valueString:
¿Alguna vez ha recibido atención en un centro de Henry Ford Health System o está afiliado actualmente con la institución? 

Esto puede incluir atención en un hospital, centro de atención de urgencia, departamento de emergencias, clínica ambulatoria o atención de empleados de HFHS.

question.text: Have you ever received care at a Spectrum Health System facility or are you currently affiliated with the system? This may include receiving care in a Spectrum hospital, urgent care, emergency department, outpatient clinic or through employee health.

extension.valueString: ¿Alguna vez ha recibido atención medica en un centro de Spectrum Health System o está actualmente afiliado con esta sistema? Esto puede incluir  el recibir atención en un hospital de Spectrum, centro de atención de urgencia, departamento de emergencias, clínica ambulatoria o atención de empleados.

question.text:

question.text: Are you a Cherokee Health Systems patient?

Have you ever received care at any Baylor Scott & White Health and/or Health Texas Provider Network facility such as:

BSWH hospitals
BSWH Urgent care centers
BSWH Emergency rooms
Hillcrest Health Clinics
Health Texas Physician Network (HTPN) clinics/physician offices

If you are uncertain, please call at 844-4US-BSWH (1-844-487-2794).

Alguna vez ha recibido atención en una localidad de Baylor Scott & White y/o Health Texas Provider Network como: 
Hospitales BSWH
Hillcrest Health Clinics (Clinicas de Salud Hillcrest)
Health Texas Physician Network
(HTPN) clinicas/consultorios del medico

extension.valueString: ¿Alguna vez ha recibido atención en algún hospital, centro de salud o clínica afiliada a Boston Medical Center (BMC) o Partners HealthCare (Partners)?
